Items.text: Hello, what can I do for you?
Oh, you guys are from the superhero school!
Hold on one second, I'll be right there.
Awesome, so you guys are here to help me for the week...
Items.name: Bank Guy

Items.text: and boy, do I have a fantastic job for you!
Items.name: Bank Guy

Items.text: The bank seems to be having what they call a coin shortage.
Items.name: Bank Guy

Items.text: Specifically, the bank is all out of quarters. We have no quarters.
Items.name: Bank Guy

Items.text: And since it is against Federal law for a bank to be without quarters...
Items.name: Bank Guy

Items.text: we're gonna need you boys to go around the town and ask if they have any spare change.
Items.name: Bank Guy

Items.text: I can give you these bills to pay back the townsfolk for all of the quarters you bring back.
Items.name: Bank Guy

Items.text: You'll have to bring me back 100 quarters!
Items.name: Bank Guy

Items.text: You can keep whatever you find past that.
Items.name: Bank Guy

Items.text: I'll be waiting back here! Come back whenever you finish!
Items.name: Bank Guy
